resources.string:
FMD is an application that can help you find your phone when it gets lost.
It uses sms to communicate. You need to have a second device or a friend so you can track your phone. 
Just write a sms that starts with "fmd". 
Still Beta.

 - Nulide
There is an update for the permissions.\nPlease check the following permissions therefore.
The communication with your lost phone will be via sms. So the application needs the Permission for this.\nThis Permission is needed.
Not everybody is allowed to contact your phone. So you need to select some contacts who than will be able to do so.\nThis permission is needed.

If you want to locate the gps coordinates from the phone, the application needs this permission. \nPlease allow the application to locate you also in background.\nWhen this permission is not given, this functionality will not be activated.
You also can let the phone ring. When DoNotDisturb is activated, it may be possible that the phone is muted.\nIf you don\'t give this permission, functionality is not granted.
If you want to lock the phone or delete it when it got lost. This permission is needed.\nWhen this permission is not given, this functionality will not be activated.

This application is capable of turning on GPS when it's off. 
In order to achieve this, the application needs a special permission that you have to grant to it with a pc. 
If you don't grant this permission, it's no problem. 
You can still use this application.
When you remotely lock the device the application can show a message on the lockscrenn.\nThis permission helps showing this information.
FindMyDevice\nThis Phone was locked!\nMessage from the Owner:

Thanks for downloading the App.
There is still a lot to do. But i hope this app will help you when you get in the same situation i had. Loosing the phone is bad, but loosing it cause there are no privacy-friendly apps outside is even worse.
Contributions or Donations are welcome. Just go to the F-Droid Store and search for my App.

 - Nulide
Pin:\nUsed as confirmation before wiping the device.
Lock Screen Message:\nWhen locking the device, this message will appear on the lock screen.
The command that is beeing used for communication with fmd.
The permissions needed for certain functionalities
Please add Landcode to the number.
" where are you - sends the current location"
